description: Try our easy to follow Refreshing Green Juice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Juice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Kale,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Refreshing Green Juice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blend kale, lemon, seeds from the pomegranate, pineapple, chia seeds, mint and 1/2 cup water until smooth. Note: This smoothie helps with your daily fruit and veggie intake. The chia seeds and pomegranate add great texture and flavour.
